member.name: T:TargaImage.Resource1
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:TargaImage.Resource1.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TargaImage.Resource1.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Paloma.TGAFormat
member.summary: The Targa format of the file.

member.name: F:Paloma.TGAFormat.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Unknown Targa Image format.

member.name: F:Paloma.TGAFormat.ORIGINAL_TGA
member.summary: Original Targa Image format.
member.remarks: Targa Image does not have a Signature of ""TRUEVISION-XFILE"".

member.name: F:Paloma.TGAFormat.NEW_TGA
member.summary: New Targa Image format
member.remarks: Targa Image has a TargaFooter with a Signature of ""TRUEVISION-XFILE"".

member.name: T:Paloma.ColorMapType
member.summary: Indicates the type of color map, if any, included with the image file.

member.name: F:Paloma.ColorMapType.NO_COLOR_MAP
member.summary: No color map was included in the file.

member.name: F:Paloma.ColorMapType.COLOR_MAP_INCLUDED
member.summary: Color map was included in the file.

member.name: T:Paloma.ImageType
member.summary: The type of image read from the file.

member.name: F:Paloma.ImageType.NO_IMAGE_DATA
member.summary: No image data was found in file.

member.name: F:Paloma.ImageType.UNCOMPRESSED_COLOR_MAPPED
member.summary: Image is an uncompressed, indexed color-mapped image.

member.name: F:Paloma.ImageType.UNCOMPRESSED_TRUE_COLOR
member.summary: Image is an uncompressed, RGB image.

member.name: F:Paloma.ImageType.UNCOMPRESSED_BLACK_AND_WHITE
member.summary: Image is an uncompressed, Greyscale image.

member.name: F:Paloma.ImageType.RUN_LENGTH_ENCODED_COLOR_MAPPED
member.summary: Image is a compressed, indexed color-mapped image.

member.name: F:Paloma.ImageType.RUN_LENGTH_ENCODED_TRUE_COLOR
member.summary: Image is a compressed, RGB image.

member.name: F:Paloma.ImageType.RUN_LENGTH_ENCODED_BLACK_AND_WHITE
member.summary: Image is a compressed, Greyscale image.

member.name: T:Paloma.VerticalTransferOrder
member.summary: The top-to-bottom ordering in which pixel data is transferred from the file to the screen.

member.name: F:Paloma.VerticalTransferOrder.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Unknown transfer order.

member.name: F:Paloma.VerticalTransferOrder.BOTTOM
member.summary: Transfer order of pixels is from the bottom to top.

member.name: F:Paloma.VerticalTransferOrder.TOP
member.summary: Transfer order of pixels is from the top to bottom.

member.name: T:Paloma.HorizontalTransferOrder
member.summary: The left-to-right ordering in which pixel data is transferred from the file to the screen.

member.name: F:Paloma.HorizontalTransferOrder.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Unknown transfer order.

member.name: F:Paloma.HorizontalTransferOrder.RIGHT
member.summary: Transfer order of pixels is from the right to left.

member.name: F:Paloma.HorizontalTransferOrder.LEFT
member.summary: Transfer order of pixels is from the left to right.

member.name: T:Paloma.FirstPixelDestination
member.summary: Screen destination of first pixel based on the VerticalTransferOrder and HorizontalTransferOrder.

member.name: F:Paloma.FirstPixelDestination.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Unknown first pixel destination.

member.name: F:Paloma.FirstPixelDestination.TOP_LEFT
member.summary: First pixel destination is the top-left corner of the image.

member.name: F:Paloma.FirstPixelDestination.TOP_RIGHT
member.summary: First pixel destination is the top-right corner of the image.

member.name: F:Paloma.FirstPixelDestination.BOTTOM_LEFT
member.summary: First pixel destination is the bottom-left corner of the image.

member.name: F:Paloma.FirstPixelDestination.BOTTOM_RIGHT
member.summary: First pixel destination is the bottom-right corner of the image.

member.name: T:Paloma.RLEPacketType
member.summary: The RLE packet type used in a RLE compressed image.

member.name: F:Paloma.RLEPacketType.RAW
member.summary: A raw RLE packet type.

member.name: F:Paloma.RLEPacketType.RUN_LENGTH
member.summary: A run-length RLE packet type.

member.name: T:Paloma.TargaImage
member.summary: Reads and loads a Truevision TGA Format image file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the TargaImage object.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.Finalize
member.summary: TargaImage deconstructor.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the TargaImage object with strFileName as the image loaded.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.LoadTGAFooterInfo(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Loads the Targa Footer information from the file.
member.param: A BinaryReader that points the loaded file byte stream.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.LoadTGAHeaderInfo(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Loads the Targa Header information from the file.
member.param: A BinaryReader that points the loaded file byte stream.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.LoadTGAExtensionArea(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Loads the Targa Extension Area from the file, if it exists.
member.param: A BinaryReader that points the loaded file byte stream.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.LoadImageBytes(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Reads the image data bytes from the file. Handles Uncompressed and RLE Compressed image data. Uses FirstPixelDestination to properly align the image.
member.param: A BinaryReader that points the loaded file byte stream.
member.returns: An array of bytes representing the image data in the proper alignment.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.LoadTGAImage(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Reads the image data bytes from the file and loads them into the Image Bitmap object. Also loads the color map, if any, into the Image Bitmap.
member.param: A BinaryReader that points the loaded file byte stream.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.GetPixelFormat
member.summary: Gets the PixelFormat to be used by the Image based on the Targa file's attributes

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.LoadThumbnail(System.IO.BinaryReader,System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat)
member.summary: Loads the thumbnail of the loaded image file, if any.
member.param: A BinaryReader that points the loaded file byte stream.
A PixelFormat value indicating what pixel format to use when loading the thumbnail.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.ClearAll
member.summary: Clears out all objects and resources.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.LoadTargaImage(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a Targa image file into a Bitmap object.
member.param: The Targa image filename
member.returns: A Bitmap object with the Targa image loaded into it.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes all resources used by this instance of the TargaImage class.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaImage.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios. If disposing equals true, the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resources can be disposed. If disposing equals false, the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not reference other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.
member.param: If true dispose all resources, else dispose only release unmanaged resources.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaImage.Header
member.summary: Gets a TargaHeader object that holds the Targa Header information of the loaded file.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaImage.ExtensionArea
member.summary: Gets a TargaExtensionArea object that holds the Targa Extension Area information of the loaded file.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaImage.Footer
member.summary: Gets a TargaExtensionArea object that holds the Targa Footer information of the loaded file.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaImage.Format
member.summary: Gets the Targa format of the loaded file.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaImage.Image
member.summary: Gets a Bitmap representation of the loaded file.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaImage.Thumbnail
member.summary: Gets the thumbnail of the loaded file if there is one in the file.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaImage.FileName
member.summary: Gets the full path and filename of the loaded file.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaImage.Stride
member.summary: Gets the byte offset between the beginning of one scan line and the next. Used when loading the image into the Image Bitmap.
member.remarks: The memory allocated for Microsoft Bitmaps must be aligned on a 32bit boundary. The stride refers to the number of bytes allocated for one scanline of the bitmap.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaImage.Padding
member.summary: Gets the number of bytes used to pad each scan line to meet the Stride value. Used when loading the image into the Image Bitmap.
member.remarks: The memory allocated for Microsoft Bitmaps must be aligned on a 32bit boundary. The stride refers to the number of bytes allocated for one scanline of the bitmap. In your loop, you copy the pixels one scanline at a time and take into consideration the amount of padding that occurs due to memory alignment.

member.name: T:Paloma.TargaHeader
member.summary: This class holds all of the header properties of a Targa image. This includes the TGA File Header section the ImageID and the Color Map.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetImageIDLength(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the ImageIDLength property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Image ID Length value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetColorMapType(Paloma.ColorMapType)
member.summary: Sets the ColorMapType property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: One of the ColorMapType enumeration values.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetImageType(Paloma.ImageType)
member.summary: Sets the ImageType property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: One of the ImageType enumeration values.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetColorMapFirstEntryIndex(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the ColorMapFirstEntryIndex property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The First Entry Index value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetColorMapLength(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the ColorMapLength property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Color Map Length value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetColorMapEntrySize(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the ColorMapEntrySize property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Color Map Entry Size value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetXOrigin(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the XOrigin property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The X Origin value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetYOrigin(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the YOrigin property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Y Origin value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetWidth(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the Width property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Width value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetHeight(System.Int16)
member.summary: Sets the Height property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Height value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetPixelDepth(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the PixelDepth property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Pixel Depth value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetVerticalTransferOrder(Paloma.VerticalTransferOrder)
member.summary: Sets the VerticalTransferOrder property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: One of the VerticalTransferOrder enumeration values.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetHorizontalTransferOrder(Paloma.HorizontalTransferOrder)
member.summary: Sets the HorizontalTransferOrder property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: One of the HorizontalTransferOrder enumeration values.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetAttributeBits(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the AttributeBits property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Attribute Bits value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaHeader.SetImageIDValue(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the ImageIDValue property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.
member.param: The Image ID value read from the file.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.ImageIDLength
member.summary: Gets the number of bytes contained the ImageIDValue property. The maximum number of characters is 255. A value of zero indicates that no ImageIDValue is included with the image.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.ColorMapType
member.summary: Gets the type of color map (if any) included with the image. There are currently 2 defined values for this field: NO_COLOR_MAP - indicates that no color-map data is included with this image. COLOR_MAP_INCLUDED - indicates that a color-map is included with this image.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.ImageType
member.summary: Gets one of the ImageType enumeration values indicating the type of Targa image read from the file.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.ColorMapFirstEntryIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the first color map entry. ColorMapFirstEntryIndex refers to the starting entry in loading the color map.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.ColorMapLength
member.summary: Gets total number of color map entries included.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.ColorMapEntrySize
member.summary: Gets the number of bits per entry in the Color Map. Typically 15, 16, 24 or 32-bit values are used.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.XOrigin
member.summary: Gets the absolute horizontal coordinate for the lower left corner of the image as it is positioned on a display device having an origin at the lower left of the screen (e.g., the TARGA series).

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.YOrigin
member.summary: These bytes specify the absolute vertical coordinate for the lower left corner of the image as it is positioned on a display device having an origin at the lower left of the screen (e.g., the TARGA series).

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.Width
member.summary: Gets the width of the image in pixels.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the image in pixels.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.PixelDepth
member.summary: Gets the number of bits per pixel. This number includes the Attribute or Alpha channel bits. Common values are 8, 16, 24 and 32.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.ImageDescriptor
member.summary: Gets or Sets the ImageDescriptor property. The ImageDescriptor is the byte that holds the Image Origin and Attribute Bits values. Available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaHeader.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.FirstPixelDestination
member.summary: Gets one of the FirstPixelDestination enumeration values specifying the screen destination of first pixel based on VerticalTransferOrder and HorizontalTransferOrder

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.VerticalTransferOrder
member.summary: Gets one of the VerticalTransferOrder enumeration values specifying the top-to-bottom ordering in which pixel data is transferred from the file to the screen.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.HorizontalTransferOrder
member.summary: Gets one of the HorizontalTransferOrder enumeration values specifying the left-to-right ordering in which pixel data is transferred from the file to the screen.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.AttributeBits
member.summary: Gets the number of attribute bits per pixel.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.ImageIDValue
member.summary: Gets identifying information about the image. A value of zero in ImageIDLength indicates that no ImageIDValue is included with the image.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.ColorMap
member.summary: Gets the Color Map of the image, if any. The Color Map is represented by a list of System.Drawing.Color objects.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.ImageDataOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the beginning of the file to the Image Data.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaHeader.BytesPerPixel
member.summary: Gets the number of bytes per pixel.

member.name: T:Paloma.TargaFooter
member.summary: Holds Footer infomation read from the image file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaFooter.SetExtensionAreaOffset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the ExtensionAreaOffset property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaFooter.
member.param: The Extension Area Offset value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaFooter.SetDeveloperDirectoryOffset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the DeveloperDirectoryOffset property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaFooter.
member.param: The Developer Directory Offset value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaFooter.SetSignature(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the Signature property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaFooter.
member.param: The Signature value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaFooter.SetReservedCharacter(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the ReservedCharacter property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaFooter.
member.param: The ReservedCharacter value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaFooter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the TargaFooter class.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaFooter.ExtensionAreaOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the beginning of the file to the start of the Extension Area. If the ExtensionAreaOffset is zero, no Extension Area exists in the file.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaFooter.DeveloperDirectoryOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the beginning of the file to the start of the Developer Area. If the DeveloperDirectoryOffset is zero, then the Developer Area does not exist

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaFooter.Signature
member.summary: This string is formatted exactly as "TRUEVISION-XFILE" (no quotes). If the signature is detected, the file is assumed to be a New TGA format and MAY, therefore, contain the Developer Area and/or the Extension Areas. If the signature is not found, then the file is assumed to be an Original TGA format.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaFooter.ReservedCharacter
member.summary: A New Targa format reserved character "." (period)

member.name: T:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea
member.summary: This class holds all of the Extension Area properties of the Targa image. If an Extension Area exists in the file.

member.summary: Sets the AuthorComments property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Author Comments value read from the file.

member.summary: Sets the DateTimeStamp property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Date Time Stamp value read from the file.

member.summary: Sets the JobName property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Job Name value read from the file.

member.summary: Sets the JobTime property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Job Time value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.SetSoftwareID(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the SoftwareID property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Software ID value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.SetSoftwareVersion(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the SoftwareVersion property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Software Version value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.SetKeyColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Sets the KeyColor property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Key Color value read from the file.

member.summary: Sets the PixelAspectRatioNumerator property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Pixel Aspect Ratio Numerator value read from the file.

member.summary: Sets the PixelAspectRatioDenominator property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Pixel Aspect Ratio Denominator value read from the file.

member.summary: Sets the GammaNumerator property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Gamma Numerator value read from the file.

member.summary: Sets the GammaDenominator property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Gamma Denominator value read from the file.

member.summary: Sets the ColorCorrectionOffset property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Color Correction Offset value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.SetPostageStampOffset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the PostageStampOffset property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Postage Stamp Offset value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.SetScanLineOffset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the ScanLineOffset property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Scan Line Offset value read from the file.

member.name: M:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.SetAttributesType(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the AttributesType property, available only to objects in the same assembly as TargaExtensionArea.
member.param: The Attributes Type value read from the file.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.ExtensionSize
member.summary: Gets the number of Bytes in the fixed-length portion of the ExtensionArea. For Version 2.0 of the TGA File Format, this number should be set to 495

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.AuthorName
member.summary: Gets the name of the person who created the image.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.AuthorComments
member.summary: Gets the comments from the author who created the image.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.DateTimeStamp
member.summary: Gets the date and time that the image was saved.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.JobName
member.summary: Gets the name or id tag which refers to the job with which the image was associated.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.JobTime
member.summary: Gets the job elapsed time when the image was saved.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.SoftwareID
member.summary: Gets the Software ID. Usually used to determine and record with what program a particular image was created.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.SoftwareVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of software defined by the SoftwareID.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.KeyColor
member.summary: Gets the key color in effect at the time the image is saved. The Key Color can be thought of as the "background color" or "transparent color".

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.PixelAspectRatioNumerator
member.summary: Gets the Pixel Ratio Numerator.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.PixelAspectRatioDenominator
member.summary: Gets the Pixel Ratio Denominator.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.PixelAspectRatio
member.summary: Gets the Pixel Aspect Ratio.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.GammaNumerator
member.summary: Gets the Gamma Numerator.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.GammaDenominator
member.summary: Gets the Gamma Denominator.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.GammaRatio
member.summary: Gets the Gamma Ratio.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.ColorCorrectionOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the beginning of the file to the start of the Color Correction table.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.PostageStampOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the beginning of the file to the start of the Postage Stamp image data.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.ScanLineOffset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the beginning of the file to the start of the Scan Line table.

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.AttributesType
member.summary: Gets the type of Alpha channel data contained in the file. 0: No Alpha data included. 1: Undefined data in the Alpha field, can be ignored 2: Undefined data in the Alpha field, but should be retained 3: Useful Alpha channel data is present 4: Pre-multiplied Alpha (see description below) 5-127: RESERVED 128-255: Un-assigned

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.ScanLineTable
member.summary: Gets a list of offsets from the beginning of the file that point to the start of the next scan line, in the order that the image was saved

member.name: P:Paloma.TargaExtensionArea.ColorCorrectionTable
member.summary: Gets a list of Colors where each Color value is the desired Color correction for that entry. This allows the user to store a correction table for image remapping or LUT driving.

member.name: T:Paloma.Utilities
member.summary: Utilities functions used by the TargaImage class.

member.name: M:Paloma.Utilities.GetBits(System.Byte,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an int value representing the subset of bits from a single Byte.
member.param: The Byte used to get the subset of bits from.
The offset of bits starting from the right.
The number of bits to read.
member.returns: An int value representing the subset of bits.
member.remarks: Given -> b = 00110101 A call to GetBits(b, 2, 4) GetBits looks at the following bits in the byte -> 00{1101}00 Returns 1101 as an int (13)

member.name: M:Paloma.Utilities.GetColorFrom2Bytes(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Reads ARGB values from the 16 bits of two given Bytes in a 1555 format.
member.param: The first Byte.
The Second Byte.
member.returns: A System.Drawing.Color with a ARGB values read from the two given Bytes
member.remarks: Gets the ARGB values from the 16 bits in the two bytes based on the below diagram | BYTE 1 | BYTE 2 | | A RRRRR GG | GGG BBBBB |

member.name: M:Paloma.Utilities.GetIntBinaryString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a 32 character binary string of the specified Int32 value.
member.param: The value to get a binary string for.
member.returns: A string with the resulting binary for the supplied value.
member.remarks: This method was used during debugging and is left here just for fun.

member.name: M:Paloma.Utilities.GetInt16BinaryString(System.Int16)
member.summary: Gets a 16 character binary string of the specified Int16 value.
member.param: The value to get a binary string for.
member.returns: A string with the resulting binary for the supplied value.
member.remarks: This method was used during debugging and is left here just for fun.
